column1: As a Senior Investment Accounting Analyst you will be responsible for the monthly and quarterly closing and reporting. Furthermore you will work in the maintenance and reporting of local regulation reporting.
As a Senior Investment Accounting Analyst your main responsibilities will involve:

Responsible for the monthly and quarterly closing for European and Latin America companies under Local and IFRS rules.
Implement local or Group changes related to chart of account

column2: ES;4 days;2020-04-17 00:58;False;"Description Business Performance Analyst-s role at Zeptolab is to help teams to grow key metrics through data. Zeptolab is a data-driven company. As a result

column5: digging through data to help a game team to find a direction and make the best possible decisions. Our company currently consists of 120 employees
column6: and you will have a chance to work with great professionals: we devote significant attention to meticulously selecting each specialist. Everyone in the company is naturally curious
column7: passionate and eager to share and absorb new information. The role: Work on a product in close cooperation with Product Manager and Game Designer; Find the ways to achieve company and product goals through the data analysis; Work with amplitude analytics system + SQL DB + internal DB; Be part of passionate analytics team
column8: who love to learn and share knowledge; Work on unified analytical tools with the data science team and constantly improve data-s value; Have a dedicated mentor who will help you to improve your skills; Drive! (Hundreds of millions of players will witness the results of your decisions and ideas worldwide. This is the level of impact Data Analytics team has
column9: and we-re looking for someone as driven as we are); Opportunities to influence the product (you-ll be able to make critical decisions that will markedly change user behaviour). What we expect from you: 1+ of experience working the gaming industry/or 2+ as a product analyst for mobile products; Solid structural and critical thinking skills; Strong self-organization skills; Communication skills - you-ll need to find a single language with teams; The ability to form hypotheses
column10: make conclusions and suggest ideas; Strong English skills; Why join us: We do something magical and unique – we create great games – and we do it well; We operate in a challenging and rapidly growing mobile gaming industry; ZeptoTeam - is a cohesive team of enthusiastic professionals - so your input will be heard
column11: and your role in the project will be weighty; Our office is cozy and beautiful
column12: you'll have a comfortable working place; And at last – we'll offer you an attractive compensation package (from wages to social intangible elements. Package includes medical insurance
column17: payment of tourist trips and a lot of additional services).

Aktana seeks an experiencedBusiness Analyst to work with our customers to understand their strategic goals and structure analytical frameworks to measure the success of these goals and quantify the ultimate business impact. The overall objective is to deepen our engagement with customers by identifying exactly how our customers are using our product and then using analytics to identify what is working and what isn't. The ideal candidate is somebody with both advanced technical skills as well as a developed business sense that enables them to identify customer needs and communicate analytical results in a non-technical way. Additionally
column2: the ideal candidate will have experience manipulating life sciences syndicated commercial data (such as Symphony or IQVIA) and will have worked in a sales and marketing analytics function or consulting role.

Do you enjoy complex optimization with real-world constraints? Are you interested in defining the future operating model for Amazon’s European operations?

Operations is at the heart of Amazon’s customer experience and differentiation. Our ambition is to be the earth’s most customer-centric business and set the industry standard for customer innovation and experience. The EU Amazon Customer Excellence System (ACES) Team is responsible for driving step-change improvements in the performance of Amazon’s European Operations. We work backwards from the customer and define new innovative solutions that raise the bar on customer experience and speed whilst constantly lower our cost of fulfillment and supporting our continued high growth.

This is a very exciting time to join the European Central Flow team given our fast growth and rapid change across the EU. The team works on the top strategic projects and opportunities across the European operations influencing business-critical decisions and taking the performance of the operations to the next level.

column1: Te damos la oportunidad de ser dueño de tu energía.

One of the most famous IT companies in the world needs a hands-on Lead Big Data Architect to become the most important person in the Barcelona area. The right candidate must have also been involved in Big Data projects (real-time) and have worked with Big Data technology for quite some time.
As a Lead Big Data Architect
column3: mentoring and leading your team as well as provide technical support to the rest of the teams within the organisation whenever necessary plus you'll always be in direct contact with providers and clients at all times. Your responsibilities will include;

column1: Provide technical support to your team and the rest of the teams when needed
Lead the Engineering team and the data strategy
Be the person in charge of presenting offers to clients from a technical point of view
Effective problem-solving skills and a creative approach to resolving problems in uncharted territory
Working on several projects simultaneously and multi-tasking
Essential to have experience as Python
Experience or knowledge with one of the major distributions of Big Data: Cloudera
Experience working with distributed data processing in real-time Storm or Spark Streaming
Experience designing and developing Big Data Solutions
Experience in managing and leading teams
Spanish and English full professional proficiency

You will contribute to empower the life of our patients worldwide by using statistical data to provide tangible outcome working with the latest technologies. Our ideal candidate will be specialized in statistics and will be focused on how to improve forecasting. Description Improve the forecasting process through the design of forecasting techniques and algorithms in order to minimize MAPE. Responsible for Defining statistical forecast strategies based on advanced algorithms: Analyses the client portfolio behavior and identifies statistical approaches for the different segments; Determines MAPE targets; Runs forecasting simulations to pick up best algorithms and optimize their parameters; Determine the Daily Sales Profiles; Generates the reporting/alerts for internal forecast review. Managing statistical forecasting tools: Prepare update of performance & baseline review tool; Develop and Maintain the forecasting simulation tools; Propose optimum statistical parameters calculated through the simulation (such as alpha
column4: beta and gamma parameters); Is able to assess the value of the different methods and algorithms and explain them in business terms. Ability to influence executives and senior management on the benefits of utilizing advanced analytics. Tools: R programming

column4: Spain The Team The team is responsible for building and maintaining the tool for detecting fraudulent orders made by the customers of the platform. The system evaluates every order using both a set of predefined rules and machine learning algorithms developed by the team. Evaluated orders are then made accessible to fraud agents via UI for taking final decision and allowing them to reject high-risk transactions. We take advantage of a very heterogeneous environment we work in. Our microservices are built in Java and deployed to AWS cloud while the data processing and learning of AI models happens in GCP. Every member (not only Data Scientists) is welcome to contribute to the research part in which we employ mostly Python. We also stay up to date with latest frontend advancements and have rewritten our UI in React. The team is formed by Software Engineers and a Data Scientist
